if (wearID == 7927) {
    npcId = 3689 + misc.random(5); // the egg ids range from 3689 to 3694 inclusively, this will choose a random one
    isNpc = true;
    updateRequired = true;
    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

[/quote]
why when i add this i have 100 error when i compile?[/quote]

item.title: Easter ring effect
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Yea, you prolly think its stupid to add the effect to the easter ring. I wanted to make it randomly make u a diferent egg each time you equipped it. Yet, when i tried to do this code it gave m 1 error. I made it to 1 egg before i tried this. How can i change this code to make it do others randomly??

                if (wearID == 7927) { // ring of stone
                npcId = misc.random(3689, 3690, 3691, 3692, 3693, 3694);
                isNpc = true;
                updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                }

Read full topic
